headline: Facebook  Keeps Policy Protecting Political Ads
abstract: The company was under intense pressure to adjust its policies. But in this presidential election year, no big changes are planned.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO â€” Defying pressure from Congress, Facebook said on Thursday that it would continue to allow political campaigns to use the site to target advertisements to particular slices of the electorate and that it would not police the truthfulness of the messages sent out.
